Commands.Canister Shot: 3-HIT BRV attack.  Inflicts Small Speed Down for 3 turns.
Commands.Scatter Shot: 2-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies.  Grants a low probability of inflicting Ranged Resistance Down for 2 turns.

Passives.Canister Shot Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Canister Shot.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Scatter Shot Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Scatter Shot.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Canister Shot Charge: Increases the max uses of Canister Shot by 1.
Passives.Leg Shot: Grants a low probability of inflicting a Small Speed Down debuff for 3 turns after a BRV Attack.
Passives.Scatter Shot Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Scatter Shot.
Passives.Expert Sniper: Slightly raises Max BRV for 3 turns after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Debuff Attack&Boost Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Canister Shot Extend: Increases Canister Shot's max uses by 3.Slightly raises its potency.Triggers an HP attack if BRV is above 80% Max BRV.
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Slightly raises Attack and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Scatter Shot Extend: Slightly raises the potency of Scatter Shot.Moderately raises BRV damage dealt when there's only 1 target.Extends the duration of Ranged Resistance Down by 1 turn.Grants Small Attack Up for 5 turns.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 5 turns after using Scatter Shot.BRV Attack+ is a 1-HIT stronger BRV attack.

Weapons.Valiant CP: 15: Increases the potency of Canister Shot.Increases the potency of Speed Down and extends its duration.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 4 turns.
Weapons.Ulysses CP: 35: Increases the potency of Scatter Shot and turns it into an unavoidable attack.Raises the success rate of Ranged Resistance Down.Grants BRV Regen for 3 turns.
